author: Lukas Reiter
script:
"""
This script shall aid in the fast identification of parameters that are potentially prone to 
object ID enumeration vulnerabilities by identifying those parameters that just transport 
integer values and adding them to the table above.
"""
from burp import IParameter

# Do the initial setup
if ref == 1 or "types" not in session:
	session["types"] = [IParameter.PARAM_URL,
											IParameter.PARAM_BODY, 
											IParameter.PARAM_COOKIE, 
											IParameter.PARAM_XML, 
											IParameter.PARAM_XML_ATTR, 
											IParameter.PARAM_MULTIPART_ATTR, 
											IParameter.PARAM_JSON]
	header = ["Ref.", "URL", "Type", "Parameter", "Value"]

# Process only in-scope HTTP requests
if in_scope:
	request = message_info.getRequest()
	request_info = helpers.analyzeRequest(request)
	for parameter in request_info.getParameters():
		value = parameter.getValue()
		type = parameter.getType()
		if value.isnumeric() and type in session["types"]:
			rows.append([ref, url, get_parameter_name(type), parameter.getName(), value])
name: Parameter - Template Script to Identify Parameters With Potential Object ID Enumeration
